thewetbandits.screens

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • thewetbandits.utils.GraphicsPane
      • thewetbandits.screens.Screen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    thewetbandits.utils.Displayable, thewetbandits.utils.Interfaceable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameOverScreen, InstructionsScreen, MainGameplayScreen, MenuScreen, ModeSelectScreen

    public abstract class Screen
extends thewetbandits.utils.GraphicsPane
    A class extending the functionality of GraphicsPane by automatically handling the addition and removal of objects to the screen when it becomes active or inactive
    Author:
    Austin
